Purpose: To confirm and quantify 11-nor-Δ9-tetrahydrocannabinol-9-carboxylic acid (Carboxy-THC) in meconium samples with reliable and accurate results following extraction.
Container: Labeled specimen container or centrifuge tube
Equipment: Gas or liquid chromatography–mass spectrometry system (GC-MS or LC-MS/MS), analytical balance, centrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes
